article.title: General Dynamics C4 Systems Awarded Contract for Marine Corps Combat Operations Centers
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: General Dynamics C4 Systems has been awarded a $41 million contract modification from the U.S. Marine Corps System Command for the production of nine capability set II combat operations centers and 18 common modules. Each operations center comprises a network of workstations and servers supporting standard tactical data systems and other mission-critical software, voice, data and voice over Internet protocol (VoIP) communications.
